title: should i start upload daily? second video btw

replies.body: In my opinion, your microphone is really quiet, but if you fix this, I think you could get a lot of subs!
replies.body_tagged: In my opinion, your microphone is really quiet, but if you fix this, I think you could get a lot of subs!

replies.body: is the one of the iphone  headphones lol

reply_to.body: In my opinion, your microphone is really quiet, but if you fix this, I think you could get a lot of subs!
reply_to.body_tagged: In my opinion, your microphone is really quiet, but if you fix this, I think you could get a lot of subs!

replies.body:
I would recommend that you could upload daily if you have all of thee aspects

Time
Make sure that you have a lot of time on your hands each day to make content for me I take nearly 4 hours out of my day to record content for my channel make sure that you have enough time to record and allow enough time to edit the video allow it to render (because rendering takes a long time) and uploading (only takes a long time depends what internet speeds you have.)

Make sure that your time won't cut into any of your school time or school work either because that's important too :)

Better Equipment
If you're going to do daily uploads and a awesome fan base then you should probably get better equipment and to be honest a iPhone earphone won't cut it! The first headset I got was some crappy Logitech headset it was like 15-20 dollars so start saving for a good headset.

That's practically it... those are just my tips from my perspective and they helped me when I started transitioning to daily uploads earlier this year but hope all goes well for your channel bro. Subscribing if you have any other questions add me on something...
